price: Wọ́n ń wí pé: “Ìgbà wo ni àdéhùn yìí yóò ṣẹ tí ẹ bá jẹ́ olódodo?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
